verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <WH1984> Praise יָ֨הּ ׀ <WH3050> ye the LORD הַֽ֭לְלוּ <WH1984> Praise אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> ye the name יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD הַֽ֝לְלוּ <WH1984> praise עַבְדֵ֥י <WH5650> [him] O ye servants יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD
שֶׁ֣֭עֹֽמְדִים <WH5975> Ye that stand בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> in the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּ֝חַצְר֗וֹת <WH2691> in the courts בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> of our God

הַֽ֭לְלוּ־ <WH1984> Praise יָהּ <WH3050> the LORD כִּי־ <WH3588> for ט֣וֹב <WH2896> [is] good יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> for the LORD זַמְּר֥וּ <WH2167> sing praises לִ֝שְׁמ֗וֹ <WH8034> unto his name כִּ֣י <WH3588> for נָעִֽים׃ <WH5273> for [it is] pleasant

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> Jacob בָּחַ֣ר <WH977> hath chosen ל֣וֹ יָ֑הּ <WH3050> For the LORD יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> unto himself [and] Israel לִסְגֻלָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH5459> for his peculiar treasure

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I יָ֭דַעְתִּי <WH3045> For I know כִּי־ <WH3588> for גָד֣וֹל <WH1419> [is] great יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> that the LORD וַ֝אֲדֹנֵ֗ינוּ <WH136> our Lord מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> [is] above all gods

כֹּ֤ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after חָפֵ֥ץ <WH2654> pleased יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Whatsoever the LORD עָ֫שָׂ֥ה <WH6213> [that] did בַּשָּׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> he in heaven וּבָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> and in earth בַּ֝יַּמִּ֗ים <WH3220> in the seas וְכָל־ <WH3605> all תְּהוֹמֽוֹת׃ <WH8415> and all deep places

מַֽעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> to ascend נְשִׂאִים֮ <WH5387> He causeth the vapours מִקְצֵ֪ה <WH7097> from the ends הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ <WH776> of the earth בְּרָקִ֣ים <WH1300> lightnings לַמָּטָ֣ר <WH4306> for the rain עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> he maketh מֽוֹצֵא־ <WH3318> he bringeth ר֝וּחַ <WH7307> the wind מֵאֽוֹצְרוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH214> out of his treasuries
שֶֽׁ֭הִכָּה <WH5221> Who smote בְּכוֹרֵ֣י <WH1060> the firstborn מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt מֵ֝אָדָ֗ם <WH120> both of man עַד־ <WH5704> against בְּהֵמָֽה׃ <WH929> and beast

שָׁלַ֤ח ׀ <WH7971> [Who] sent אֹת֣וֹת <WH226> tokens וּ֭מֹפְתִים <WH4159> and wonders בְּתוֹכֵ֣כִי <WH8432> into the midst מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of thee O Egypt בְּ֝פַרְעֹ֗ה <WH6547> upon Pharaoh וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> and all עֲבָדָֽיו׃ <WH5650> and upon all his servants
שֶֽׁ֭הִכָּה <WH5221> Who smote גּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> nations רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> great וְ֝הָרַ֗ג <WH2026> and slew מְלָכִ֥ים <WH4428> kings עֲצוּמִֽים׃ <WH6099> mighty

לְסִיח֤וֹן ׀ <WH5511> Sihon מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> king הָאֱמֹרִ֗י <WH567> of the Amorites וּ֭לְעוֹג <WH5747> and Og מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king הַבָּשָׁ֑ן <WH1316> of Bashan וּ֝לְכֹ֗ל <WH3605> and all מַמְלְכ֥וֹת <WH4467> and all the kingdoms כְּנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> of Canaan
וְנָתַ֣ן <WH5414> And gave אַרְצָ֣ם <WH776> their land נַחֲלָ֑ה <WH5159> [for] an heritage נַ֝חֲלָ֗ה <WH5159> an heritage לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <WH3478> unto Israel עַמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5971> his people

יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> O LORD שִׁמְךָ֣ <WH8034> Thy name לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD זִכְרְךָ֥ <WH2143> [and] thy memorial לְדֹר־ <WH1755> throughout all וָדֹֽר׃ <WH1755> generations

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יָדִ֣ין <WH1777> will judge יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> For the LORD עַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> his people וְעַל־ <WH5921> on עֲ֝בָדָ֗יו <WH5650> himself concerning his servants יִתְנֶחָֽם׃ <WH5162> and he will repent
עֲצַבֵּ֣י <WH6091> The idols הַ֭גּוֹיִם <WH1471> of the heathen כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> [are] silver וְזָהָ֑ב <WH2091> and gold מַ֝עֲשֵׂ֗ה <WH4639> the work יְדֵ֣י <WH3027> hands אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of men's

פֶּֽה־ <WH6310> They have mouths לָ֭הֶם <WH1992> like וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not יְדַבֵּ֑רוּ <WH1696> but they speak עֵינַ֥יִם <WH5869> not eyes לָ֝הֶ֗ם <WH1992> like וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִרְאֽוּ׃ <WH7200> have they but they see

אָזְנַ֣יִם <WH241> They have ears לָ֭הֶם <WH1992> like וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not יַאֲזִ֑ינוּ <WH238> but they hear אַ֝֗ף <WH637> all אֵין־ <WH369> Nor יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> not neither is there ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> [any] breath בְּפִיהֶֽם׃ <WH6310> in their mouths

כְּ֭מוֹהֶם <WH3644> will be like יִהְי֣וּ <WH1961> become עֹשֵׂיהֶ֑ם <WH6213> They that make כֹּ֭ל <WH3605> them everyone אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בֹּטֵ֣חַ <WH982> them are like unto them [so is] every one that trusteth בָּהֶֽם׃

בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> O house יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <WH3478> of Israel בָּרֲכ֣וּ <WH1288> Bless אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> O house אַ֝הֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> of Aaron בָּרֲכ֥וּ <WH1288> bless אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> O house הַ֭לֵּוִי <WH3878> of Levi בָּרֲכ֣וּ <WH1288> Bless אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD יִֽרְאֵ֥י <WH3373> ye that fear יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD בָּרֲכ֥וּ <WH1288> bless אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

בָּ֘ר֤וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> be the LORD מִצִּיּ֗וֹן <WH6726> out of Zion שֹׁ֘כֵ֤ן <WH7931> which dwelleth יְֽרוּשָׁלִָ֗ם <WH3389> at Jerusalem הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> Praise יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> ye the LORD
